Headline: Countries where Netflix is now available
Text:
Netflix is now available in nearly 200 countries and territories around the world.  "You are witnessing the birth of a global TV network," Netflix CEO Reed Hastings said Wednesday. The streaming service was already available in about 60 countries; he announced that another 130 countries had just been added.  So, first, it's easiest to list the countries where Netflix is not available: China
Crimea
North Korea
Syria Here is where you can get it. Countries in bold were added Wednesday: Afghanistan
